description:
Twitter temporarily locked Kanye West's account after he published an antisemitic tweet.  His handle @kanyewest has over 31.4 million followers.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Kanye West's verified Twitter account (@kanyewest) tweets at least once between October 11, 2022 12:00 PM ET and October 31, 2022 11:59:59 PM ET inclusive. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No". Note that reply tweets count for this market. If Kanye West tweets within the market timeframe, but the tweet is deleted afterwards, this market will still resolve to "Yes."

The resolution source for this market is Kanye West's verified Twitter account: https://twitter.com/kanyewest.

Please note, only the @kanyewest verified Twitter account counts for this market, regardless of the URL for this profile. If Kanye West tweets from another account, it will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

markets.question: Will @kanyewest tweet again before November?

title: Will @kanyewest tweet again before November?
